main event: A fireball with a tail resembling a string of beads was observed in Watsonville, California on January 5, 1952.
interesting points: The fireball was seen shortly after 0100 PST,The object was approximately 1000 feet above ground,It resembled an elongated, arrow-shaped form with a fuzzy outline,The event was also witnessed in Grass Field, Gonzales, and Hollister, California,The sighting was documented on film.
sighted object: fireball with a tail like a string of beads
